text: Shahdadpur Railway Station (, ) is located in Shahdadpur city, Sanghar district, Sindh, Pakistan. ==See also== * List of railway stations in Pakistan * Pakistan Railways ==References== ==External links== * Official Web Site of Pakistan Railways Category:Railway stations in Sanghar District Category:Railway stations on Karachi–Peshawar Line (ML 1)
title: Shahdadpur railway station
